TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit AsyncStateMachineAttribute extends System.Runtime.CompilerServices.StateMachineAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AsyncStateMachineAttribute Inherits StateMachineAttribute

summary.span: 表示方法是以 Async 還是以 [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) 修飾詞標記。

span.span: Indicates whether a method is marked with either the Async or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不應該套用`AsyncStateMachine`屬性設定為您的程式碼中的方法。You shouldn't apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to methods in your code. 如需有 async 修飾詞的方法，編譯器會套用`AsyncStateMachine`中的 IL，編譯器會發出屬性。For methods that have the async modifier, the compiler will apply the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute in the IL that the compiler emits. 當方法 (*MethodName*) 具有非同步或 async 修飾詞，編譯器會發出包含狀態機器結構的 IL。When a method (*MethodName*) has the Async or async modifier, the compiler emits IL that includes a state machine structure. 此結構包含在方法中的程式碼。This structure contains the code in the method. IL 也包含虛設常式方法 (*MethodName*)，呼叫狀態機器。That IL also contains a stub method (*MethodName*) that calls into the state machine. 編譯器會加入`AsyncStateMachine`屬性加入虛設常式方法，以便工具可以識別對應的狀態機器。The compiler adds the `AsyncStateMachine` attribute to the stub method so that tools can identify the corresponding state machine. 發出的 IL 的詳細資料可能會在未來版本中變更的編譯器。Details of the emitted IL might change in future releases of the compilers. 如需非同步功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 Async 和 Await 進行非同步程式設計](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7)。For information about the Async feature, see [Asynchronous Programming with Async and Await](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/db854f91-ccef-4035-ae4d-0911fde808c7). ## Examples 如下列範例所示，您可以判斷方法是否以標記[非同步](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md)或是[非同步](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md)修飾詞。As the following example shows, you can determine whether a method is marked with [Async](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/async.md) or [async](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/async.md) modifier. 在範例中，`IsAsyncMethod`執行下列步驟：In the example, `IsAsyncMethod` performs the following steps: - 取得物件所使用的方法名稱。Obtains a object for the method name by using . - 取得使用屬性的物件[GetType 運算子](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md)或是[typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md)。Obtains a object for the attribute by using [GetType Operator](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator.md) or [typeof](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/typeof.md). - 使用取得的方法和屬性類型的屬性物件`MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`。Obtains an attribute object for the method and attribute type by using `MethodInfo.GetCustomAttribute`. 如果`GetCustomAttribute`會傳回`Nothing`(Visual Basic) 或`null`(C# 中)，此方法不包含屬性。If `GetCustomAttribute` returns `Nothing` (Visual Basic) or `null` (C#), the method doesn't contain the attribute. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncStateMachineAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/runtime.compilerservices.asyncstatemachineattribute/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type stateMachineType) cil managed

param.name: stateMachineType
param.span: 基礎狀態機器類型的類型物件，該類型會被用來實作狀態機器方法。

span.span: The type object for the underlying state machine type that's used to implement a state machine method.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
